<p class="russiannovelnarrow">I am a PhD Student in the Department for [Experimental Psychology](http://www.ipsy.ovgu.de/en/exppsy.html) at the [Otto-von-Guericke University Magdeburg](https://www.uni-magdeburg.de/en/).
